name: Halfmoon Betta
description: The Halfmoon betta is arguably one of the prettiest betta species. It is recognized by its large tail that can flare up to 180 degrees.

name: Kaluga Black
description: The royal union of the Kaluga and Shassetra sturgeons makes for an exceptional caviar, celebrated the world over for its beautifully balanced flavor.
